r.s: An interface to query and return information from a game server
r.d: Net_GameServerQuery provides an interface for querying game servers
r.n: QA release Package 2.0 SVN dir layout Bug #3296 wrong include path in protocol.php Complete rework of the protocol parsing classes and associated methods. Significant useability improvements in the API. Massive speed improvements in parsing. Added support for protocols: - Doom3 - QuakeWorld - Quake3 - HalfLife - HalfLife2 - GameSpy - GameSpy04 - UnrealEngine2
